description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nThroat Ripper:
After one of your {RACE_Eft}s attack, all of your {RACE_Eft}s recover {STAT_health} equal to 5% of the damage dealt for each {RACE_Eft} fighting on your side. This trait does not stack.
name: Howler Skull
